metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24994 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack overflow in the parse_tag function in libass/ass_parse.c in libass before 0.15.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or remote code execution via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24994` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libass5 - 0.13.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libass package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
